reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operation of charitable kitchens and distribution of food baskets for those trapped in Ghouta Damascus.

description.narrative: Achieving the food security of the besieged in Eastern Ghouta, where the project works to provide two types of food (cooked meals ready-distribution of food baskets) and operate two kitchens in both (Douma and Arabin).

Alleviate the impact of the siege and its effects on poor and affected families Contribute to achieving food security for the besieged by providing 200 thousand meals for the most needy and poor families and families who can not cook food on their own and provide 5,633 food basket for besieged families enough for each family for 20 days Providing food permanently in light of the loss of fuel needed for cooking due to severe shelling and siege on the city Reducing the financial burden of the besieged and transferring their savings to health and education.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
